name: The Werehouse
description:
Let's get 'em, Fellas!

In this 1985 arcade classic, you play as a wolf catcher named Raymond , along with your coworkers Hector , Spector , Dexter , and Jones . You've just gotten a call from some warehouse managers, and they're saying that wolves have invaded their storage facilities! In this all-time classic, you'll be running left to right, up and down, and catching wolves of all colors and sizes!

Hopefully, the WolfSnatchers will be able to catch those troublemakers  Arf,  Barf,  Zarf, and  Reginald; That is, unless something terribly unexpected doesn't happen...

Controls

Move using the arrow keys or the WASD keys

Confirm, swing your net, slap and break cages using the Z key or the K key (This is referred to as "Fire" within the game)

Jump using the X key or the L key (This is referred to as "Secondary Fire" within the game)

Pause the game using the Enter key or the Escape key

Credits

Cubby Crazes - Main creator of the game

Mr Scotsman (@Mr__Scotsman) - Co-creator of the game and voice actor, who made this project prosper and come to life

E-man38 and Ruberjig (@Ruberjig_) - Playtesters and idea contributors

Bry (@xlovedevil) - Artist for the game's cover art, and idea contributor

Dippy (@Dippy0615) - for just being so cool
